name: built.io
description: Idea to app in record time
overview:
built.io is a mobile backend and application development platform.

By powering the entire backend (servers, cloud infrastructure, database, scaling), and delivering built-in core app functionality, built.io lets developers build apps in record time, and focus their talent on an awesome user experience. Built from the ground up to support the growing enterprise mobility market, built.io is first to release business user tools, a unique feature set among mobile application development platforms.

Integrated functionality helps developers turn on core application plumbing like notifications, user authentication, social media, uploads, and analytics. For business users, a full-blown content editor is integrated to let them handle firedrills on their own. With enterprise-class security, and the option for a dedicated built.io instance, companies can protect their app investments.
